titles.title: A bill to improve the Fugitive Safe Surrender Program.
A bill to improve the Fugitive Safe Surrender Program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Amends the Adam Walsh Child Protection and Safety Act of 2006 to place the Fugitive Safe Surrender Program under the direction of the Attorney General (currently, the United States Marshals Service) and to authorize appropriations for the Program for FY2012-FY2016.
